Most people will never change.

The ones who will? They're doing this:

Quiet reinvention...

Tiny decisions create dramatic transformations.

The question is: What tiny decision will you make today?

Playing small doesn't help anyone.

It just keeps people comfortable...

Every Saturday, I send 175,000+ entrepreneurs the exact playbook for building an audience and business around your expertise.

Stop comparing yourself to others...

Your only job is to grow.

Every day, get a little better than you were yesterday.

Stop watching everyone else.
Start growing.

People love escalating small issues to leaders who are easily distracted.

Focussed leaders grow more mature teams by asking them to fend for themselves versus being their rescuer all the time.
